div.div:
This hook gives you access to
a ThemeCollection, so you can freely add a new Theme, add/remove layouts to an existing one, ...

switch.text: This hook gives you access to...

div.div:
This hook allows you to modify the variables used in layouts, so you can add your own or change the existing ones
Note: these are only the twig variables used in your layout, not the template variables that use the {firstnam} syntax, these ones will be replaced at the last moment by the Mailer when the email is sent

switch.text: This hook allows you to modify th...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 170px; height: 1px; padding-top: 979px; margin-left: 550px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Then the renderer uses
Twig to render the layout with its variables and the requested locale

div.div:
This hook allows you to add your own TransformationInterface which are used after the layout is rendered to perform modifications on the rendered template.
The provided layout and template type allows to filter when you need to apply the transformations.

switch.text: This hook allows you to add your own Transform...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 250px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1197px; margin-left: 550px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Then the renderer applies all the transformations to the output template, e.g.:
- CSSInline : fetch css linked and apply them as inline style
- HTMLToText : strip all html tags to render it as raw text
- you could add a transformation to change all text colors, or insert an additional footer or header

switch.text: Then the renderer applies all the transfor...

switch.text: This class is a command containing all the settings for the generation action....

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 354px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1369px; margin-left: 366px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Then the generator dumps the template in the appropriate file. The output folder is the one from the command (if specified), which is useful to overwrite theme mail templates.
If no folders have been specified then the default folder are:
- /mails/{locale} : for core emails
- /modules/{module_name}/mails/{locale} : for module emails

switch.text: Then the generator dumps the template in the appropriate fi...

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
